original_title: Trump orders review of Smithsonian museums after calling them 'woke' | Fox News
article_summary: Trump orders Smithsonian museum review, accusing institutions of pushing divisive narratives and promoting a "woke" agenda, with a focus on removing partisan content ahead of America's 250th anniversary. The review will target eight museums, including the National Museum of American History, and will focus on public-facing content, curatorial processes, and overall narrative standards.</s>
